Name: Ortolan
About the game: Simple Dodge & Slash & Bang game -- You need to kill your enemies to earn your life. Or they would gorge you. You should make a stand with your little kitchen knife, Or you could get other items. Dodge all enemy's approach, and slash them all. Don't be a prey anymore, Ortolan.
